mapper.sql: select id, eq_type_id, tunnel_id, user_name, eq_id,code,create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, before_state, operation_state, control_type, state, description from sd_operation_log
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.eq_type_id, d.type_name, a.tunnel_id, b.tunnel_name, a.user_name, a.eq_id, c.eq_name, a.code, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.before_state, a.operation_state, e.state_name, CASE a.control_type WHEN 1 THEN '时间控制' WHEN 2 THEN '光强控制' ELSE '手动' END AS control_type , CASE a.state WHEN 0 THEN '成功' WHEN 1 THEN '失败' END AS state, a.description, a.oper_ip from sd_operation_log a left join sd_tunnels b on a.tunnel_id = b.tunnel_id left join sd_devices c on a.eq_id = c.eq_id left join sd_equipment_type d on a.eq_type_id = d.type_id left join sd_equipment_state e on a.operation_state = e.device_state AND e.state_type_id=a.eq_type_id and state_type = 2 where 1=1 and a.eq_type_id = #{eqTypeId} and a.tunnel_id = #{tunnelId} and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%') and a.oper_ip like concat('%', #{operIp}, '%') and a.eq_id = #{eqId} and a.code = #{code} and a.before_state = #{beforeState} and a.operation_state = #{operationState} and a.control_type = #{controlType} and a.state = #{state} and a.description = #{description}
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND (b.dept_id = #{params.deptId} OR b.dept_id IN ( SELECT d.dept_id FROM sys_dept d WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{params.deptId},d.ancestors) ))
order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into sd_operation_log
eq_type_id, tunnel_id, user_name, eq_id,
code, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, before_state, operation_state, control_type, state, description, oper_ip, event_id
#{eqTypeId}, #{tunnelId}, #{userName}, #{eqId},
#{code}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{beforeState}, #{operationState}, #{controlType}, #{state}, #{description}, #{operIp}, #{eventId}
mapper.update:
update sd_operation_log
eq_type_id = #{eqTypeId}, tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}, user_name = #{userName}, eq_id = #{eqId},
code = #{code}, create_by = #{createBy}, update_time = sysdate(), update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, before_state = #{beforeState}, operation_state = #{operationState}, control_type = #{controlType}, state = #{state}, description = #{description},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from sd_operation_log where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select id from sd_operation_log where create_time < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 month)
where eq_id = #{eqId} order by create_time desc limit 0,1

select devices.eq_name as eqName, devices.eq_direction as eqDirection, log.operation_state as state, log.state as executeResult,log.eq_type_id as eqType, DATE_FORMAT(log.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as executeTime from sd_operation_log log left join sd_devices devices on log.eq_id = devices.eq_id -- left join sd_equipment_state e on log.operation_state = e.device_state AND e.state_type_id=log.eq_type_id and state_type = 2 where log.event_id =#{eventId} order by log.create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into sd_operation_log
eq_type_id, tunnel_id, user_name, eq_id,
code, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, before_state, operation_state, control_type, state, description,
#{eqTypeId}, #{tunnelId}, #{userName}, #{eqId},
#{code}, #{createBy}, sysdate(), #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{beforeState}, #{operationState}, #{controlType}, #{state}, #{description},
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.eq_type_id, d.type_name, a.tunnel_id, b.tunnel_name, a.user_name, a.eq_id, c.eq_name, a.code, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.before_state, a.operation_state, e.state_name, a.control_type, a.state, a.description, a.oper_ip from sd_operation_log a left join sd_tunnels b on a.tunnel_id = b.tunnel_id left join sd_devices c on a.eq_id = c.eq_id left join sd_equipment_type d on a.eq_type_id = d.type_id left join sd_equipment_state e on a.operation_state = e.device_state AND e.state_type_id=a.eq_type_id and state_type = 2 where 1=1 and a.create_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 day)
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{start},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{end},'%y%m%d')
AND (b.dept_id = #{deptId} OR b.dept_id IN ( SELECT d.dept_id FROM sys_dept d WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{deptId},d.ancestors) ))
order by a.create_time desc
